sentences.sentence: It was a great night and I had a massive hangover.
sentences.translation: 那是个愉快的夜晚，可第二天我出现了严重的宿醉。

sentences.sentence: It is thought attendance figures in the US and Canada will rise next year, when sequels to the hit comedies The Hangover and Pirates of the Caribbean are released.
sentences.translation: 人们认为明年美国和加拿大的上座率将会上升，届时热门喜剧《宿醉》和《加勒比海盗》的续集将会上映。

sentences.sentence: She woke up with a terrible hangover.
sentences.translation: 她醒来时宿醉反应很厉害。
